text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Okay everyone! We'll be doing vocal lessons in preparation for the live concert!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hawawawa! The blue sky, the white clouds, and that wild smell…! For what reason!? Why!? Please tell me, Shiraoki-sama!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh! Scarlet, look over there! It's a restless bull! It's huge! I wonder if I could ride it like a motorbike!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Why are you so excited!? Jeez, they said this was going to be a lesson, so why did they force me onto a train and bring me here…!?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: No no, there's a reason we had to come all the way out here! I heard that the anniversary live concert venue will be so so big!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why we needed to come to this big farm! Let's practice using our outdoor voices!
